projects.name: Learning Equality
projects.description: Created GitHub Actions for scheduled Morango integration tests and automated AUTHORS.md updates. Implemented feature of real-time task percentage in tab title and added automatic alphabetic sorting to the topic tree. Resolved multiple frontend issues and bugs, improving application stability.

projects.name: Passipy
projects.description: An end-to-end system that checks the strength of passwords using Machine Learning algorithm. Random Password Generator: Generate customized passwords with various constraints. Password Manager: Store and manage passwords in a database with CRUD operations.

projects.name: BlissFit
projects.description: Eortlessly explore exercises targeting specic body parts and access step-by-step guides with YouTube recommendations for eective workouts. Leverage OpenCV technology, ensuring an impressive 85% accuracy for real-time posture feedback during exercises.

experiences.description: Contributed to an integrated solution, involving various frontend and backend components for both user and admin interfaces. Congured and deployed the application on IIS, addressing security issues and improving network robustness, leading to a 65% reduction in vulnerabilities. Implemented connector to consolidate data from three SQL databases, optimizing information ow for improved eciency.
